name: Disoriented (itch)
description:
Explore an extensive maze and solve a series of puzzles to escape the dark hallways of Disoriented. Grab yourself a pen and a piece of paper and start drawing a map, because there is none in the game! Or mark the walls with your chalk. Or both... Yes, seriously, you will need it! And bring at least some hours, this is a serious endeavor and not a stroll in the park. (Take a peek at our map template if you want a preview of the dimensions)

Suuna has problems finding her friend during a game of Hide and Seek and ends up trapped in a vast underground maze with lots of tricky puzzles. Only you can help her getting out of this misery!
Fully voiced story in german with subtitles in english and german.

Controlls:
WASD movement & left mouse action (ingame tutorial included)
Compatible with XBox360 Controllers on Win & Mac

smøl hold consists of Steven Sobkowski, Mary Hennings, Oliver Kniejski and Luisa Philipp. This game is the result of 10 months part time work for a course at Beuth University of Applied Sciences Berlin. It has been updated with several improvements since its initial release.

Music by Eddy Toreal (Facebook |  Soundcloud)
